name: No-Brakes Taxi
description:
Quick Entry made for GMTK Jam 2020. First "completed" solo game jam project. Made with Unity in less than 8 hours.

The theme was "Out of Control", so my interpretation of that was a barely controllable taxi cab that was ALL GAS + SOME BRAKES. Gotta pick up the passengers and drop them off all without wrecking your car.
